Here are the instructions for manually installing from the tarball from [http://code.google.com/p/nautilussvn/downloads/list the downloads section].

= Installing using the setup script =
You can install the extension globally using the setup script (setup.py), here's how:

{{{
sudo python setup.py install
nautilus -q && nautilus &
}}}

And you're done.
